tests.name: Tests ocults ex1
tests.setup: python -m pip install --upgrade pip && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; fi && if [ -f .hidden-tests/requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r .hidden-tests/requirements.txt; fi && pip install pytest
tests.run: set -e; TEST_PATH=$(find .hidden-tests -type f -name 'test_hidden.py' -print -quit); if [ -z "$TEST_PATH" ]; then echo 'test_hidden.py not found under .hidden-tests'; exit 2; fi; echo Executant: "$TEST_PATH"; TEST_DIR=$(dirname "$TEST_PATH"); export PYTHONPATH="$PWD:$PYTHONPATH"; pytest -q "$TEST_DIR"
